verbose_text: LDP produced a significantly lower amount of intraoperative blood loss (210 mL vs. 420 mL, P < 0.05), shorter first flatus time (1.5 d vs. 4 d, P < 0.05), and shorter diet start time (2 d vs. 6 d, P < 0.05).
